turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'M READY

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I am ready too. How do you feel about children's charity?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: IT IS VERY COMFORT FOR THE CHILDREN'S

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yeah, i'm glad there are organizations to help children, since they can't really help themselves. What are some of the more nameworthy charities you can think of? We have St Judes Childrens Hospital rather close to here as well as several different charities for all kinds of needs

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: YEAH,SOME OF THEM CAN'T REALLY HELP FOR THE CHARITY.BUT SOMEONE GIVE'S THEIR HANDS FOR THEM

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, you definitely got to be on the look out for false charities. I use resources like Charity Navigator for this. Have you heard of it? It provides a non-biased "grade" for charities based on how thruthful they are as well as how well they manage their funds. It helps me make the right choices and not just throw my money away

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: YES I HEARD ABOUT THAT.EVERYONE SHOULD AWAKENED AND GIVES CHARITIES TO THEM

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Definitely. Do you donate to charities ever? I am not financially well-off, but I try to give forward what I can. At grocery stores or supermarkets they usually have those Helping Hand charities or something similar and I usually give my change to them. It has to count for something, hopefully..

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: YES I DONATE TO MANY CHARITIES. EVEN THOUGH WE ARE NOT FINANCIALLY WELL OFF GIVE A SINGLE DOLLAR IS HELP THEM TO SATISFIED FOR FOOD

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yeah definitely. President Obama did the same sort of thing with "Grassroots" Fundraising. Instead of getting a few really large donations, he was able to get several millions of small donations to fund his presidential campaign. It shows the power of small amounts of money. Charities rely on funds to keep doing their work so I think it\'s important to help when possible. I always told myself if I am ever more financially secure in the future, I would help as much as possible.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: THAT'S GOOD TO DO

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you. Do you also have charities soliciting money in grocery stores and gas stations or banks around you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: NO BUT IN SOME SORT NEARBY

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thats good. At least you have some local people trying to make a change

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: FINE.YEAH ABSOLUTELY SURE

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Very fine. I hope you're having a good day

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: SURE.THANK YOU.YOU TO HAVING A NICE DAY

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes I am having a nice day. It's raining here currently pretty hard but I like thunderstorms.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: OK.HAVE A SAFE AND GOOD DAY

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you, I don't plan on doing anything today but relaxing but I will try to make it safe
